item.title: Codespaces but open-source, client-only, & unopinionated
item.description: - Codespaces is an open-source tool that allows developers to easily set up development environments without the need for server-side setup.

item.title: Loneliness is stronger when not alone
Sub.Rehab â€“ See where Reddit communities have relocated
item.description: - Many Reddit communities are currently private or restricted due to protests against Reddit's new API terms.

item.title: "Exit traps" can make your Bash scripts more robust & reliable (2013)
item.description: - Using "exit traps" in bash scripts can make them more reliable by ensuring necessary cleanup operations are always performed, even when something unexpected goes wrong.

item.title: Submarine missing near Titanic used a $30 Logitech gamepad for steering
item.description: - A tourist submarine called Titan went missing with five people on board during an expedition to explore the Titanic shipwreck site.

item.title: A daytime nap is good for the brain
item.description: - Taking daytime naps can be beneficial for the brain, according to researchers from University College London.

item.title: Tell HN: Stripe killed my music locker service, so I'm open sourcing it
item.description: - The author of the post is open sourcing their music locker service after it was shut down by Stripe.

item.title: Style your RSS feed
item.description: - RSS feeds are still relevant and widely used in the tech industry, but many people don't know how to use them or understand them.

item.title: Rivian embraces Tesla's charging standard for EVs
item.description: - Rivian has partnered with Tesla to adopt Tesla's charging standard for electric vehicles.

item.title: YouTube: Sort by oldest is back baby
item.description: - YouTube has restored the "Sort by Oldest" feature, allowing users to view the oldest videos on a channel.
